metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for teenage boy character
metadata.age_appropriate_note: CRITICAL: All scenes must be completely age-appropriate for a 14-year-old boy

scenes.title: Pre-Dawn Bedroom
scenes.lighting: soft gray-blue pre-dawn light through thin curtains
scenes.description: A 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin and short black slightly wavy hair sleeps on his side in a single bed with Colombia flag-themed bedding (yellow, blue, red stripes). The room has light blue walls covered with soccer posters (Messi, James Rodriguez, Junior de Barranquilla), a small desk with textbooks, a shelf with soccer trophies and medals, a soccer ball on the tile floor, and cleats by the door. A ceiling fan spins slowly overhead. Pale pre-dawn light through thin curtains.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black slightly wavy hair, sleeping on side in single bed, Colombia flag-themed bedsheet yellow blue red stripes, light blue walls, soccer posters (Messi, James Rodriguez), small desk with textbooks, shelf with soccer trophies and medals, soccer ball on tile floor, cleats by door, ceiling fan overhead, soft pre-dawn light through thin curtains, teenage boy bedroom, peaceful sleep
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, dark room, scary, inappropriate

scenes.title: Sitting Up in Bed
scenes.description: Camilo sits up slowly in bed, rubbing both eyes. His short black hair sticks up on one side from the pillow. He wears a faded yellow Colombia national team jersey as sleepwear. He yawns widely. The Colombia flag bedsheet pools around his waist. On the nightstand, a phone screen shows a second alarm. The Messi poster is on the wall above the headboard.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black messy wavy hair sticking up, sitting up in bed rubbing eyes, yawning widely, wearing faded yellow Colombia soccer jersey, Colombia flag bedsheet around waist, phone on nightstand showing alarm, Messi poster above headboard, soft warm morning light, teenage boy waking up
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, neat hair, inappropriate

scenes.title: Making the Bed
scenes.description: Camilo pulls the Colombia flag bedsheet up toward the pillow with both hands, straightening it roughly. A teenager's quick bed-making effort. He smooths the yellow, blue, and red stripes. The single white pillow is flipped and placed at the head. Morning sunlight streams through the window across the bed and tile floor. The ceiling fan hums.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black wavy hair, pulling up Colombia flag-themed bedsheet yellow blue red stripes, making bed quickly, smoothing sheet with one palm, single white pillow at headboard, bright morning sunlight streaming through window, tile floor, ceiling fan above, teenage boy doing chores, bedroom morning
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, perfect bed making, inappropriate

scenes.title: Choosing Clothes from Closet
scenes.description: Camilo stands at the open closet, pulling out a white short-sleeve button-up shirt and navy blue pants for school. School uniforms hang on the left side, casual clothes and his red and white Junior de Barranquilla jersey on the right. Black school shoes and cleats on the closet floor. A belt hook holds a black belt.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black wavy hair, standing at open closet, pulling out white button-up shirt and navy pants school uniform, hangers visible, red and white soccer jersey hanging on right side, black shoes and cleats on closet floor, black belt on hook, morning light in bedroom, getting ready for school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, messy closet, inappropriate

scenes.title: Packing the Soccer Bag
scenes.description: Camilo kneels on the tile floor beside a red drawstring sports bag, packing soccer gear. He rolls the red and white Junior de Barranquilla jersey and places it inside. Black shorts, shin guards, and long red soccer socks are added. Muddy cleats are knocked together to shake off dirt. The bag sits plump and full.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black wavy hair, kneeling on tile floor, packing red drawstring sports bag with soccer gear, rolling red and white jersey, black shorts folded, white shin guards, red soccer socks, muddy cleats nearby, morning light in bedroom, preparing for practice
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, empty bag, inappropriate

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Camilo holds a green toothbrush and brushes his teeth with quick strokes, mouth foaming. His reflection in the mirror shows him mid-brush, lips pulled back, white foam at corners. A toothbrush cup on the wall holds four toothbrushes (green, pink, white, blue). Mint toothpaste tube sits on the shelf. White and light blue tile walls.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black wavy hair, brushing teeth with green toothbrush, white foam around mouth, looking at reflection in bathroom mirror, toothbrush cup with four colored toothbrushes on wall, mint toothpaste on shelf, white and light blue tile walls, bright bathroom light, morning hygiene routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, dirty bathroom, inappropriate

scenes.title: Fixing Hair with Gel
scenes.description: Camilo works a dab of clear hair gel through his short black hair, pushing the slightly wavy strands into place — neat on the sides, a little lift on top. He tilts his head left and right, checking the result in the mirror. A blue comb and the open jar of gel sit on the shelf. His hair looks tidy now.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, working hair gel through short black slightly wavy hair, checking hairstyle in bathroom mirror, tilting head, blue comb and open gel jar on shelf beside mirror, neat hair sides with lift on top, white and light blue tile bathroom, bright light, teenage grooming routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, long hair, inappropriate

scenes.title: Putting on School Shirt
scenes.description: Camilo buttons up his white short-sleeve school shirt from bottom to top, fingers working each small white button. The shirt is crisp and clean. The white fabric contrasts with his light brown skin at the collar. He tucks the shirt into his navy blue pants. The black belt is threaded through but not yet buckled. His reflection in the mirror shows a schoolboy taking shape.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black neat hair with gel, buttoning white short-sleeve school shirt, fingers on white buttons, tucking shirt into navy blue pants, black belt threaded through loops, checking reflection in bathroom mirror, bright bathroom light, getting dressed for school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, casual clothes, inappropriate

scenes.title: Final Mirror Check
scenes.description: Camilo stands before the bathroom mirror, checking his complete school uniform. White button-up shirt neatly tucked, navy blue pants with black belt buckled, hair gelled into place. He straightens his collar with both hands. The mirror shows the bathroom behind him: blue shower curtain, towel hooks, tile walls. He nods — ready for school.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black wavy hair neatly gelled, standing at bathroom mirror checking complete school uniform, white short-sleeve button-up shirt tucked in, navy blue pants, black belt buckled, straightening collar with both hands, mirror reflection shows blue shower curtain and towel hooks, bright bathroom, ready for school
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, messy uniform, casual clothes, inappropriate

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth Evening
scenes.description: Camilo stands at the sink for his evening tooth-brushing. His face is sleepy, eyes slightly droopy, the energy of the day drained. He brushes methodically but slowly. The mirror reflects a tired teenager. He spits, rinses, and puts the toothbrush back. The bright bathroom light feels harsh against his tired eyes.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black wavy hair slightly messy, brushing teeth slowly at bathroom sink, sleepy tired expression, droopy eyes, green toothbrush in hand, mirror reflecting tired teenager, evening bathroom routine, bright overhead light, end of long day
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, adult, child, girl, energetic expression, inappropriate

scenes.title: Lacing Up Cleats
scenes.description: Close-up of Camilo's hands lacing soccer cleats on the sideline bench. Black cleats with white accents, rubber studs caked with dried mud. He pulls each lace tight, ties firm double knots. Red soccer socks pulled smooth over white shin guards. His feet flex, testing the fit, then he bounces on his toes on the grass.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, close-up of teenage boy's hands lacing black soccer cleats with white accents on sideline bench, pulling laces tight, double knot, rubber studs with dried mud, red soccer socks over white shin guards, green grass below, afternoon sun, soccer practice preparation, sports detail
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor, basketball shoes, inappropriate

scenes.title: Dribbling Through Cones
scenes.description: Camilo weaves through a zigzag line of eight orange cones on the practice field, dribbling the soccer ball at speed. He cuts sharply right-left-right, the ball staying close to his feet. His red and white jersey is sweat-darkened. He accelerates through the last cones and shoots into a mini-goal. The green grass field stretches behind him, palm trees beyond the fence.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black hair, wearing red and white soccer jersey number 10, black shorts, dribbling soccer ball through zigzag orange cones at speed, body leaning into cut, ball close to feet, green grass field, mini-goal ahead, palm trees beyond fence, bright afternoon sun, soccer drill, athletic movement
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor, standing still, adult, child, girl, inappropriate

scenes.title: Shooting On Goal
scenes.description: Camilo steps up to take a shot from the penalty spot. He plants his left foot beside the ball and strikes with his right instep. The ball rockets toward the bottom right corner of the goal. The goalkeeper dives. The metal goal posts and white net frame the scene. Golden afternoon light casts long shadows across the green grass. Teammates watch from the penalty line.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin, short black hair, red and white soccer jersey, striking soccer ball from penalty spot, right foot follow-through, ball flying toward goal bottom corner, goalkeeper diving, metal goal posts with white net, golden afternoon light, long shadows on green grass, teammates watching, dynamic soccer action
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor, standing still, adult, child, girl, inappropriate, empty field

scenes.title: Celebrating a Goal
scenes.description: Red team celebrates a goal during scrimmage. Camilo sprints with arms raised, grinning. The scorer slides on his knees across the grass. Camilo jumps on his back in a joyful piggyback. Other teammates pile on in red jerseys. The goal net is visible behind them, ball in the back of the net. Golden hour light bathes the scene. Palm trees silhouetted beyond the fence.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, group of teenage boys in red and white soccer jerseys celebrating goal, 14-year-old Colombian boy with light brown skin sprinting arms raised grinning, teammate sliding on knees on green grass, joyful piggyback celebration, other players piling on, goal net with ball visible behind them, golden hour sunlight, palm trees silhouetted beyond fence, youth soccer scrimmage joy
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor, sad, alone, adult, girl, inappropriate, fighting

scenes.title: Water Break at Sideline
scenes.description: Camilo at the sideline bench during a water break. He squeezes a stream of water from a plastic bottle into his open mouth, then pours water over his head. His red and white jersey is soaked with sweat. His face is flushed, chest heaving. Other boys sprawl on the grass behind him. The bench holds sports bags and water bottles. A slight breeze stirs the palm trees beyond the fence. The coach reviews his clipboard nearby.
